capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he can be a bit...selfish at times. He always seems to think about himself first, which can make it hard for others to get a word in edgewise. I'm not saying he's all bad, but his personality does tend to lean towards being quite self-centered.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's eyes are looking a bit down today. I can tell he's feeling pretty down about something because his blue eyes seem to be, well, blue - you know, like they're not even trying to hide it anymore. He looks really upset.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's eyes look really blue, and I can tell he's feeling a bit down, it seems like his blue eyes are giving away that he's not doing so great.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is a great example of a strong and intelligent character in the Harry Potter series. I think she's an amazing role model for young girls everywhere, don't you?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, it's not like there's any doubt about that - she's one of the brightest witches of our age and has been a student at Hogwarts for years.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's lineage is indeed a mix of both Muggle and wizarding blood. I'm quite certain about it, to be honest. She's always been so proud of her heritage, and I think it's really admirable how she's made the most of being a mixed-blood witch.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's family background and it seems like his lineage is pretty interesting.
